MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH47 postcode area of Bathgate. Engineers are continuing to replace a faulty electrical pole at Blackburn Mains Farm and we still expect all power to be restored by Midnight. We understand that to be without power is frustrating and we apologise for this. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:25 PM on Thursday, 29 October 2020.
